Subclass/Dual Class Master Raina:

You need to create/reset a subclass, huh?
A new subclass starts at Level 40. "I'll add a new subclass (create new)".

(Change subclass and your level will be reset to level 40). "I'll eliminate a sublcass and add another one. (reset)".

Maintain your level while changing classes. "I'll change my subclass (need Subclass Change Certificate)".
